title: Easy Pineapple Salsa Recipe
directions: In a large bowl, combine pineapple, tomatoes, cilantro, red onion, and jalapenos. Add lime juice and toss to coat.
Season to taste with salt, pepper, and hot pepper sauce, if using. Allow flavors to blend at room temperature for 30 minutes, or chill until serving time. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 bunch cilantro finely chopped, about 1 cup
3-4 jalapeno peppers seeded and finely chopped (about Â½ cup or more to taste)
2 tablespoons fresh lime juice from 2 limes
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Hot pepper sauce to taste, optional
